title: HOW DO I STOP MY GAME FROM AUTO UPDATING TO THE NEW CLIENT
body:
i dont want to upgrade, and its not giving me any say in it. I thought we could choose? There is no pause/ abort button nothing

PLEASE HELP RIOT I WANNA PLAY NORMAL LEAGUE

replies.body:
You still have to upgrade to the beta, but you can switch back to the legacy client at any time from here:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/230175788#h1q5

You don't. You can, however, return it to the "legacy" client in the launcher by clicking on the "Legacy Client" option (which is located in the lower right, if I remember correctly). However, I'm pretty sure that the LCU (League Client Update) will *completely* replace the Legacy Client once it reaches "full release".
